children.text: When making Avengers Infinity War, the Russo brothers came up with a word to describe the convergence of characters from different franchises, noting how the cross-pollination of contrasting or complimentary characters made for a better crossover. That’s true.
argues that you can learn more about your industry from studying
industries, than by attempting to learn everything you can about it in a vacuum. Also, probably, true.
Perhaps proactively facilitating “strange alchemy” in our projects, in our education, and even in our organizations is one fine way to nurture creativity and not stifle it.
